178.reason: General question/feature request, closed, not actionable for SDK docs

183.reason: Already covered by rules file (type 'url' is invalid, use 'http'); 0 reactions

185.title: v0.2.47 notes mention Query.promptSuggestion(), but npm package does not expose it

186.reason: Already documented as Known Issue #26 (slash command output regression)

187.reason: Related to Known Issue #22 (large MCP tool output forces filesystem dependency)

189.reason: Already mentioned in Known Issue #19 description

190.title: No way to disable cloud MCP server auto-discovery from claude.ai account

191.reason: Environment-specific slow execution; no clear reproducible root cause; 0 reactions

192.reason: Interesting cache bug but no user-facing workaround; 0 reactions

193.title: fallbackModel not passed through on streaming to non-streaming fallback path
193.reason: SDK internal bug with no user-level workaround; 0 reactions

194.reason: Interactive hooks always time out at 60s with no disable option; workaround is large timeout value

554.reason: Cosmetic error affecting bypassPermissions mode since v0.1.29, workaround exists

523.title: allowed_tools=[] (empty list) is treated as falsy
523.reason: Common pitfall with clear workaround (use None instead of [])

567.title: sub-agents not getting registered
567.reason: Fixed in v0.1.35 - updated Known Issue #3 to reflect fix

571.title: StructuredOutput tool fails when agent wraps output
571.reason: Common structured output validation issue with workaround

10.title: cwd in ClaudeCodeOptions does not seem to be honored
10.reason: High reaction count (13), affects users broadly, workaround exists

378.title: Query.close() can hang indefinitely causing 100% CPU
378.reason: Production issue with clear workaround (asyncio.timeout or env var)

462.title: Subprocess Transport Only Returns Init Message in FastAPI Context
462.reason: High reaction count (5), affects FastAPI users, no workaround yet

316.title: PreToolUse hooks not called for Read tool when file doesn't exist
316.reason: Contradicts documentation, breaks legitimate hook use cases

553.title: Thinking blocks missing when using Opus 4.6
553.reason: Fixed in v0.1.36 - documented for historical reference

337.title: Bug: @filepath syntax not supported, agents silently dropped
337.reason: Related to #567, same root cause (agents not registered)

374.title: Structured outputs seems to be flaky
374.reason: Related to #571, same StructuredOutput validation issue

510.title: Model serializes arrays as JSON strings in StructuredOutput

573.reason: Clear workaround exists, affects legitimate SDK use case (hooks/plugins)

574.title: search_result content blocks silently dropped by MCP tool result handler
574.reason: Blocks important RAG citations feature, no workaround except bypassing SDK

577.title: Agent Teams: Subagent SendMessage not delivered to team lead in SDK mode
577.reason: Experimental feature, workarounds exist (sleep/polling), not widespread issue yet

578.reason: Clear bug with specific trigger, workaround is to use AsyncIterable prompts

579.title: ResultMessage shows total_usd_cost even though anthropic api key was never set
579.reason: Documentation/clarification issue, not a bug with workaround

580.title: fix: keep stdin open for hooks during multi-turn agent execution
580.reason: PR to fix #554, not an issue to document

529.title: fix: capture actual stderr in ProcessError instead of hardcoded message (PR)
529.reason: PR that fixes KI #17 - referenced in Known Issue #17 docs

555.title: Session resume silently creates new session despite valid session file and correct parameters
555.reason: Related to KI #16 (session file flush timing), referenced in Known Issue #16 docs

583.title: MessageParseError on rate_limit_event crashes receive_messages() generator
583.reason: Closed (PR #598 merged), but fix not yet released; #601 is current open tracking issue

584.title: Session file not flushed before disconnect causes resume failure
584.reason: Session file flush timing issue documented as KI #16

597.title: SDK MCP servers invisible to CLI when using string prompts
597.reason: Broader scope than #578: reveals MCP server init missing + premature stdin close; updated KI #14 title and causes

601.title: MessageParseError on rate_limit_event message type terminates async generator
601.reason: Current open tracking issue for rate_limit_event crash (follow-up to #583); added link to KI #15

602.title: Custom local plugins not all showing up when hitting + sign
602.reason: Desktop UI issue, 0 reactions, not SDK API issue, no workaround

581.title: Add context_management (clear_thinking + clear_tool_uses) as first-class ClaudeAgentOptions parameter
581.reason: Feature request, 0 reactions, no workaround to document

603.title: rate_limit_event causes MessageParseError instead of being handled gracefully
603.reason: Duplicate of #601/#583; added #603 link to KI #15 and noted PR #598 merged fix (pending release)

604.title: [SECURITY] Edit tool reads file content before PreToolUse hook validation, allowing content probing
604.reason: Security edge case, 0 reactions, 0 comments; workarounds are drastic (disable Edit tool); CLI-level issue with no SDK API workaround
